endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Seed for different images and reproducibility. Use -1 to randomise seed

parameters.description: Seed for different images and reproducibility. Use -1 to randomise seed

parameters.name: frames

param_schema.title: Frames
param_schema.description: Length of the video in frames (playback is at 8 fps e.g. 16 frames @ 8 fps is 2 seconds)

parameters.description: Length of the video in frames (playback is at 8 fps e.g. 16 frames @ 8 fps is 2 seconds)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: photo of vocano, rocks, storm weather, wind, lava waves, lightning, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: photo of vocano, rocks, storm weather, wind, lava waves, lightning, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: Output format of the video. Can be 'mp4' or 'gif'

parameters.description: Output format of the video. Can be 'mp4' or 'gif'

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Guidance Scale. How closely do we want to adhere to the prompt and its contents

parameters.description: Guidance Scale. How closely do we want to adhere to the prompt and its contents

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: blur, haze, deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch, cartoon, drawing, anime, mutated hands and fingers, deformed, distorted, disfigured, poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, amputation
